answer: You can reset your password using the [UNSW Identity Manager](https://iam.unsw.edu.au).
You can recover or reset your zID at the [UNSW Identity Manager](https://iam.unsw.edu.au).
Invoices can be submitted through [myUNSW Reimbursement](https://my.unsw.edu.au).
You can view and manage your class timetable in [myUNSW Timetable](https://my.unsw.edu.au).
All course materials and assessments can be accessed via [UNSW Moodle](https://moodle.telt.unsw.edu.au).
To enroll, drop, or swap courses, visit [UNSW Enrollment Portal](https://my.unsw.edu.au).
For any IT issues, contact UNSW IT Support via [it@unsw.edu.au](mailto:it@unsw.edu.au).
